{{Infobox football biography | name = Christián Herc | image = | fullname = Christián Herc | height = {{convert|1.85|m|ftin|0|abbr=on}} | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1998|9|30|df=y}} | birth_place = [[Levice]], [[Slovakia]] | currentclub = [[FC DAC 1904 Dunajská Streda|Dunajská Streda]]
(on loan from [[Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C.|Wolverhampton Wanderers]]) | clubnumber = 24 | position = [[Midfielder]] | youthyears1 = 2008–2015 | youthclubs1 = [[FC Nitra]][https://sport.aktuality.sk/c/203059/slovenske-talenty-christian-herc-myslienkou-vzdy-o-krok-vpred/ Slovenské talenty: Christián Herc - Myšlienkou vždy o krok vpred] 05.02.2016, sport.aktuality.sk | youthyears2 = 2015–2017 | youthclubs2 = [[Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C.|Wolverhampton Wanderers]] | years1 = 2017– | clubs1 = [[Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C.|Wolverhampton Wanderers]] | caps1 = 0 | goals1 = 0 | years2 = 2018– | clubs2 = → [[FC DAC 1904 Dunajská Streda|Dunajská Streda]] (loan) | caps2 = 31 | goals2 = 6 | nationalyears1 = 2015 | nationalteam1 = [[Slovakia national under-17 football team|Slovakia U17]] | nationalcaps1 = 2 | nationalgoals1 = 0 | nationalyears2 = 2016–2017 | nationalteam2 = [[Slovakia national under-19 football team|Slovakia U19]] | nationalcaps2 = 3 | nationalgoals2 = 1 | nationalyears3 = 2017– | nationalteam3 = [[Slovakia national under-21 football team|Slovakia U21]] | nationalcaps3 = 6 | nationalgoals3 = 0 | club-update = 12 December 2018 | nationalteam-update = 16 October 2018 }} '''Christián Herc''' (born 30 September 1998) is a [[Slovakia|Slovak]] [[Association football|football]] midfielder who currently plays for [[Slovak First Football League|Fortuna Liga]] club [[FC DAC 1904 Dunajská Streda]], on loan from [[Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C.|Wolverhampton Wanderers]]. ==Club career== ===FC DAC 1904 Dunajská Streda=== Herc made his professional [[Slovak First Football League|Fortuna Liga]] debut for [[FC DAC 1904 Dunajská Streda]][http://ulk.futbalnet.sk/zapas/278887/ FK Senica - FC DAC 1904 Dunajská Streda 0:2] 18.02.2018, futbalnet.sk against [[FK Senica]] in February 18, 2018. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://fcdac.sk/sk/hrac/3518/christian-herc FC DAC 1904 Dunajská Streda official club profile] * {{Soccerway|christian-herc/400886}} * [http://futbalnet.sk/member/1276575/#player Futbalnet profile] {{FC DAC 1904 Dunajská Streda squad}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Herc, Christian}} [[Category:1998 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Slovak footballers]] [[Category:Slovak expatriates in England]] [[Category:Association football midfielders]] [[Category:Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C. players]] [[Category:Expatriate footballers in England]] [[Category:FC DAC 1904 Dunajská Streda players]] [[Category:Slovak Super Liga players]] [[Category:People from Levice]] {{Slovakia-footy-midfielder-stub}}
